text: Nikolai Fyodorovich Fyodorov was a Russian philosopher who wanted to make everyone immortal. He was called the "Socrates of Moscow."Семёнова С. Г. Философия воскрешения Н. Ф. Фёдорова // Фёдоров Н. Ф. Собрание сочинений: В 4 т. Том 1. ==References== Category:1829 births Category:1903 deaths Category:Russian philosophers Category:Transhumanism
title: Nikolai Fyodorovich Fyodorov
